reuters.title: ALGER TO EXPAND DISTRIBUTION OF OPEN-ENDED FUND
reuters.body: <Alger Inc> said it will sell the Alger Fund through broker-dealers as a result of its agreement with Dealer Network Services, a division of the newly-established <Rutland Securities L.P.>. The fund formerly was sold only directly to investors, Alger said. Dealer Network Services is organizing a countrywide group of established broker-dealers to sell the Alger Fund, Alger said.
